description: Try our easy to follow Crunchy Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chips & fries,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Halal,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Crunchy Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, cut up into wedges (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cut potato into thick chips. Place in a large microwave-safe bowl with 1 tbs water. Cover loosely with plastic. Microwave on HIGH (100%) for 5 minutes or until tender. Transfer to a colander. Rinse with cold water. Drain. Cool.

Combine breadcrumbs, salt, paprika and pepper in a bowl. Toss chips in egg then coat with breadcrumb mix. Transfer to prepared tray and spread in a single layer. Spray with olive oil. Bake for 20 minutes or until crisp and golden. Serve with lemon.
